entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
